sourcesContent:
<template>
    adetails
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import axios from 'axios';
  
  // Define the columns outside the data method
  const columns = [
    { name: 'id_number', label: 'Id Number', align: 'left', field: 'id_number' },
    { name: 'lastname', label: 'Lastname', align: 'left', field: 'lastname' },
    // ... other columns
  ];
  
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        info: [],
      };
    },
    created() {
      this.getInfo();
    },
    computed: {
      // Use a computed property to filter info based on the id from the URL
      filteredInfo() {
        const studentId = this.$route.params.id;
  
        // If the id is not available or info is empty, return an empty array
        if (!studentId || this.info.length === 0) {
          return [];
        }
  
        // Filter the info array to only include the student with the specified id
        return this.info.filter(student => student.id === parseInt(studentId));
      },
    },
    methods: {
      async getInfo() {
        try {
          const response = await axios.get('getstudentdata');
          this.info = response.data;
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('Error fetching data:', error);
        }
      },
    },
    // Bind the columns to the component
    computed: {
      columns() {
        return columns;
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
